summary: SummaryCollagen Niacinamide Jelly Cream is a transparent collagen jelly cream from Medicube that provides anti-aging benefits to enhance facial contours, promote firmness, and achieve a polished and glowing complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsBoosts skin hydration and plumpness with collagen and niacinamideImproves elasticity and reduces sagging for firmer-looking skinRestores skin natural inner radiance with tightened, radiant, volumized 'Korean Glass Glow' effectFeaturesFreeze‑Dried Hydrolyzed Collagen-– Provides low molecular collagen for deep absorption, enhancing skin elasticity and firmnesLightweight, jelly texture absorbs fast with a cooling finishGentle, pH-balanced formula—free from Silicon and artificial colorantsKey IngredientsNiacinamide (Vitamin B3): Boosts skin's barrier and hydrationFreeze-dried Hydrolyzed Collagen: Helps improve firmness and elasticitySqualane (Plant-derived): Helps prevent moisture loss and gives suppleness to skinHydrolyzed Elastin: Promotes soft, hydrated appearanceItem 2645369How To UseApply a quarter amount of jelly cream morning and evening to face and décolletage(neck&chest), after applying targeted serums that address your individual skin concerns.Morning Skincare After cleansing, apply a moderate amount of the jelly cream to your face. Gently pat or massage. Allow the product to fully absorb into your skin before proceeding with your makeup application.Evening Skincare After cleansing, apply a generous amount of the jelly cream avoiding the areas around the eyes and mouth. Allow it to fully absorb into your skin before going to bed.Pro Tip! For enhanced results, consider pairing this product with AGE-R Booster Pro.For external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. *Read instructions and caution before use.IngredientsWater, Propanediol, Dipropylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Methylpropanediol, Diethoxyethyl Succinate, Ethoxydiglycol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Beheneth-25 Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Niacinamide, Trehalose, 1,2-Hexanediol, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Collagen, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Cynanchum Atratum Extract, Althaea Rosea Flower Extract, Soluble Collagen, Allium Sativum (Garlic) Bulb Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Bertholletia Excelsa Seed Extract, Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Extract, Camellia Sinensis Seed Extract, Salmon Egg Extract, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Spinacia Oleracea (Spinach) Leaf Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Wine Extract, Polyglyceryl-10 Isostearate, Tromethamine, Glucose, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fructooligosaccharides, Fructose, Adenosine, Sodium Phytate, Cyanocobalamin, Tocopherol, Pullulan, Glycerin, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Squalane, Soluble Proteoglycan, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Sodium DNA, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Fragrance(Parfum).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a quarter amount of jelly cream morning and evening to face and décolletage(neck&chest), after applying targeted serums that address your individual skin concerns.Morning Skincare After cleansing, apply a moderate amount of the jelly cream to your face. Gently pat or massage. Allow the product to fully absorb into your skin before proceeding with your makeup application.Evening Skincare After cleansing, apply a generous amount of the jelly cream avoiding the areas around the eyes and mouth. Allow it to fully absorb into your skin before going to bed.Pro Tip! For enhanced results, consider pairing this product with AGE-R Booster Pro.For external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. *Read instructions and caution before use.

reviews.headline: Allergic reaction
reviews.comments: Applied this to my face and neck and the next morning my entire face and neck were broke out in tiny bumps and rough patches. Definitely had an allergic reaction to one of the ingredients in it.

reviews.headline: Medicine skincarw
reviews.comments:
Yes 
I love everything about their skin care line
I'd recommend this to anyone who will listen

reviews.headline: Feels great at first but is actually quite drying
reviews.comments: When you first put this one it feels so nice and looks so glowy. But it absorbs so quickly and leaves you feeling dry and needing to put on even more. I noticed the dry flakiness around my mouth and chin area like others have said. Will not be using

reviews.headline: Glazed donut skin
reviews.comments: I always get compliments when i use this in the morning before leaving the house. I really like it specially with the booster pro because it actually lets you glide the device around for 2 minutes but with other products it doesnt work as well. When i dont use it with the device though my skin absorbs it up just as fast as any other moisturizer. Love the texture and the glass skin effect on my skin.

reviews.headline: Dry, burning skin
reviews.comments: I do not have sensitive skin, and I bought this to try out a new moisturizer. One time after using it, I woke up with flaky skin around my mouth. After using it for a few days, my entire face is completely dry and flaky, and burns to the touch. Definitely not worth it.

reviews.headline: Fountain of youth
reviews.comments: Im not sure why there are negative reviews, this stuff does wxacrly what it says it will do. Its heavy, but ifnyou apply with a damp face, it settles in nicely. It took a few times using it for my face to adjust, but my skin teulg does look like glass now. Im also using the vitamin C cream and its just as heavenly!

reviews.headline: Wanted to Love
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this moisturizer, but I woke up with dry and even flaky skin near my mouth, which is something that hasn't happened to me in a while, especially with all the moisturizing products I use. On my hand, it looked very nice, moisturizing and shiny, but when applied to my face it almost felt like applying something with a lot of silicone in it, but it eventually absorbed nicely. However, my face wasn't as glowy as usual and was basically matte by the morning.

reviews.headline: dry, flaky, burning skin
reviews.comments: if I could give this no stars, I would. I used this product once and woke up with dry, flaky, burning skin. two days later and I still have burning skin. I am still struggling with the aftermath of this product. definitely would not recommend.

reviews.headline: Great product but can cause breakouts
reviews.comments: This product does what it says it does and my skin looks glowy and feels so soft but since i started using this i have had more white heads and breakouts, not sure if this is the true reason why but could be contributing to it.

reviews.headline: Phenomenal!
reviews.comments: I tried this jelly cream along with the mini pro medicube device last night and I woke up with smooth skin and soft! This is pretty thick and also sticky, so use this at the end of your skincare routine... it looks moisture. I just am in shock how soft and smooth my face feels and also tight

I defined wouldnt recommend this because it sits on your skin, i bought it once directky from the medicube website and it was a horrible experience i woke up w red sensitive skin and it was so greasy and stayed on my pillow i hated jt please dont waste your money

reviews.headline: Love this jelly
reviews.comments: It is a bit sticky when you apply, but my skin feels soft and moisturizer in the morning. I have a combination skin type and this has been the best night time moisturizer. I definitely recommend this product.

reviews.headline: Just wow!
reviews.comments: You can use this as a moisturizer or a mask. Can't ask for a better product! You want glass skin? This is will help you get there!

faceoff_positive.comments: I always get compliments when i use this in the morning before leaving the house. I really like it specially with the booster pro because it actually lets you glide the device around for 2 minutes but with other products it doesnt work as well. When i dont use it with the device though my skin absorbs it up just as fast as any other moisturizer. Love the texture and the glass skin effect on my skin.

faceoff_negative.comments: I wanted to love this moisturizer, but I woke up with dry and even flaky skin near my mouth, which is something that hasn't happened to me in a while, especially with all the moisturizing products I use. On my hand, it looked very nice, moisturizing and shiny, but when applied to my face it almost felt like applying something with a lot of silicone in it, but it eventually absorbed nicely. However, my face wasn't as glowy as usual and was basically matte by the morning.
